overview: Tianqin Lang Li Enping was born in the 90s and studied music performance at an art college in Tianjin. Many consider him to be a ladyboy. Li Enping's father has been absent for many years and almost gave up his responsibility to the family. Li Enping's mother is a stay-at-home mom. Helpless, she is asking Buddha for relief. In order to earn money to support his family and pay tuition fees, the strong and stubborn Li Enping withstands the pressure of survival and public opinion and takes on the path of acting like a girl.
title: Flying Geese
